Spike proteins from the SARS-CoV-2 virus can affect multiple organs and biological processes in the body. They can damage lung cells, including pulmonary alveoli and pulmonary endothelial cells, and also harm mitochondria and DNA structures.4 Additionally, spike proteins can damage cardiovascular cells, increase the risk of blood clots, and harm brain cells.4 They can also promote inflammation, suppress immunity, and increase the risk of cancer.4 Furthermore, spike proteins can cause oxidative stress, leading to premature cell death and a hyperoxidized state in the body.  If the Spike Proteins from COVID-19 can affect multiple organs and biological processes, what makes anyone think the the mRNA induced spike proteins couldn't be used to negatively affect your body as well?
